ingredients.item: 150g pack essential Waitrose Raw King Prawns

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the prawns for 1 minute until pink throughout. Stir in the noodles and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Pour in the dressing from the salad. Then add the salad and cook for 1 minute to heat through. Sprinkle over the parsley, and serve.
